title: Ep. 781 Who Is “Our Guy”?
description:
Summary:
The entire Spygate scandal is finally being exposed. In this episode I address the scandalous beginnings of the FBI investigation into Trump and the sources they may be hiding.
 
News Picks:
This Byron York piece addresses the curious links between a Russian oligarch and Christopher Steele. 
 
This Sara Carter pieces addresses some troubling information about Bruce Ohr’s connections. 
 
This Jeff Carlson piece addresses who “our guy” could be.
 
Bob Mueller may have a troubling conflict in his investigation. 
 
Why was Chris Steele trying to connect to Bob Mueller?
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
